SELECT board_idx, title, contents, create_id, create_dt, update_id, update_dt, hit_cnt FROM sboard WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sboard (title, contents, create_id, create_dt) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents} , #{createId} ,now())
mapper.update: UPDATE sboard SET title= #{title} , contents= #{contents}, update_id= #{updateId}, update_dt= now() WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}

UPDATE sboard SET hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
